Posts.Content: Apr 20, 2011 05:45PM - edited Apr 20, 2011 05:46PM by djwraw Hi my name is Deb , found out about 2 weeks ago that I have cancer in my right breast. Numerous test and bio later ICD stage 1 grade 2 ER+/PR+, HER2-. Scheduled for surgery this coming Monday. On pins & needles, one good thing, I have a super support group between family, friends & peers at work. Couldn't ask for a better group of people.
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker
